tokens.definition: לַיִל layil, lah'-yil; or (Isaiah 21:11) לֵיל lêyl; also לַיְלָה laylâh; from the same as H3883 ; properly, a twist (away of the light), i.e. night; figuratively, adversity:—(mid-)night (season).
tokens.kjv_translation_count: night (205x), nights (15x), midnight (with H 2677) (4x), season (3x), midnight (with H 2676) (2x), night (with H 1121) (2x), midnight (1x), midnight (with H 8432) (1x).
outline: night night (as opposed to day) of gloom, protective shadow (fig.)
